blue leaf Core¶

These are some core functionalities and settings which can normally left untouched.

SASS¶

$gutter

gutter scaling (default: 0.2rem)

$container

container scaling (default: 10rem)

$columns

number of columns (default: 12)

$rows

number of rows (default: 12)

$screensizes

map of screen sizes with their ranges (default: (s: (0em 40em), m: (40.063em 64em), l: (64.063em)))

$predefined

indicates whether predefined CSS rules should be generated or not (default: true)

JavaScript¶

blueleaf.apply()¶

Re-applys JavaScript-based rules. Call it whenever DOM changes are made. (The plan is to automate this).

blueleaf.scrollarea.offset¶

Holds information of the scrollarea’s offset (has attributes top,right,bottom,left). Used to correct jump links in combination with sticky elements.

blueleaf.scrollarea.changeOffset(newoffset)¶
Arguments:
  • newoffset – Values to be added to the current offset, same structure as blueleaf.offset.

Change the scrollarea’s offset.
